publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-832 Robin Harper: Ethical Investment-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to investigate the possibility of adopting an ethical investment and procurement policy.
S1M-832 Ethical Investment (lodged on 10 May 2000) Shona Robison*

S1M-832 Robin Harper: Ethical Investment-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to investigate the possibility of adopting an ethical investment and procurement policy. Supported by: Shona Robison
S1M-832 Ethical Investment (lodged on 10 May 2000) Cathy Jamieson*

S1M-832 Robin Harper: Ethical Investment—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to investigate the possibility of adopting an ethical investment and procurement policy. Supported by: Shona Robison, Cathy Jamieson, Linda Fabiani, Kate Maclean, Cathy Peattie, Hugh Henry, Tommy Sheridan, Nora Radcliffe, Irene McGugan, Michael Russell*
